H0.text: what 's the average lifespan of a basset hound. 8 - 10 years

H1.text: what 's the average lifespan of a basset hound. 15 years

H2.text: what 's the average lifespan of a basset hound. 7 - 9 years

H3.text: what 's the average lifespan of a basset hound. 10 -- 12 years

A4.text: A 2024 study in the UK found a life expectancy of 12.5 years compared to an average of 12.7 for purebreeds and 12 for crossbreeds.

A5.text: A 2015 French study found a life expectancy of 10.3 years.
